title: Research and Markets: Portugal Oil and Gas Market Insight and Outlook Report (H2 2015) - Forecasts of Exploration, Production, Refinery, LNG, Storage, Pipeline Projects, Investments, Companies, Trade and Prices
text:
Related Content 
DUBLIN--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- 
Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/l2stjk/portugal_oil_and ) has announced the addition of the "Portugal Oil and Gas Market Insight and Outlook Report (H2 2015) - Forecasts of Exploration, Production, Refinery, LNG, Storage, Pipeline Projects, Investments, Companies, Trade and Prices" report to their offering. 
The Portugal oil and gas report provides complete analysis and forecasts of Portugal upstream, downstream and midstream sectors. The research work provides analysis of key opportunities and associated challenges facing Portugal markets. Yearly production and consumption forecasts of oil, gas, LNG, LPG, gasoline, diesel and fuel oil from 2005 to 2025 are included in the report. Further, primary energy demand, GDP, population and vehicle production details are provided from 2005-2025. 
All potential new business and investment opportunities in Portugal oil and gas markets with feasibility of planned projects, expected start up, and investments required are included. Further, asset wise details of oil fields, gas fields, exploration blocks, LNG terminals, storage, pipeline and refineries operational in the country are analyzed. 
Portugal Infrastructure, market conditions, investment climate and competitive landscape are analyzed through sophisticated tools and presented in a user friendly manner through SWOT analysis, benchmarking and positioning matrix. 
The report also details the business profiles of three key companies in Portugal oil and gas industry. Business operations, SWOT Analysis and financial performance of the companies are provided. All latest developments in Portugal oil and gas industry and their impact on the industry are included in the report. 
Key Topics Covered: 
2 Portugal Oil and Gas Market Analysis 
3 Portugal Oil and Gas Outlook to 2025 
4 Investment Opportunities in Portugal Oil and Gas Sector 
5 Portugal Macro-Economic and Demographic Analysis and Outlook to 2025 
6 Portugal Oil and Gas Companies and Market Competition Outlook 
7 Portugal Upstream Industry Analysis and Outlook 
8 Portugal LNG Industry Analysis and Outlook 
9 Portugal Refinery Industry Analysis and Outlook 
10 Portugal storage industry Analysis and Outlook 
11 Portugal pipeline industry Analysis and Outlook 
12 Company Profiles of Oil and Gas Companies in Portugal 
13 Latest Portugal oil and gas News Landscape 
For more information visit http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/l2stjk/portugal_oil_and View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20151012006006/en/ Contact:
